required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Immunogenicity AND Safety Study of the 11 Valent Recombinant Human Papillomavirus Vaccine (Hansenulapolymorpha)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Blind, and Positive Control Design to Evaluate the Immunization Efficacy of 11 Valent Recombinant Human Papillomavirus Vaccine (Hansenulapolymorpha) in Chinese Women Aged 18-26 Years

lead_sponsor.agency: National Vaccine and Serum Institute, China

collaborator.agency: Chengdu Institute of Biological Products Co.,Ltd.
Simoon Record Pharma Information Consulting Co., Ltd
Guangxi Center for Disease Control and Prevention
Beijing Kantorico Statistical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: National Vaccine and Serum Institute, China

brief_summary.textblock: A total of 480 Chinese women aged 18-26 years old were enrolle，experimental group and the control group were randomly assigned in a ratio of 3:1. 360 Chinese women in the experimental group and 120 in the control group. All subjects enrolled in the upper arm deltoid muscle were injected with 3 doses of test vaccine or control vaccine according to the 0, 2, and 6 months immunization program.

primary_outcome.measure: Anti-HPV neutralizing antibody positive conversion rate（after full immunization 30 days）

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 13 months

primary_outcome.description: All AEs: incidence of AEs related to vaccines and unrelated The rate of Solicited for AE Non-collective AEs: incidence of AEs related to vaccines and unrelated AE level 3 and above: incidence of vaccine-related and unrelated AEs

primary_outcome.measure: collect AEs leading subject to withdrawal
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 13months
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of vaccine-related and unrelated AEs

primary_outcome.measure: collect All pregnancy conditions and pregnancy outcomes
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 13 months
primary_outcome.description: collect pregnant woman Anti-HPV neutralizing antibody positive conversion rate and Anti-HPV neutralizing antibodies GMT

intervention.intervention_name: Biological/Vaccine: 11-valent recombinant human papilloma virus vaccine (Hansenula polymorpha)
intervention.description: Inject vaccine produced by ChinaVaccineSerum, containing HPV antigen protein, 270μg/1ml per bottle
Inject Gardasil 9 , containing HPV antigen protein, 270μg/0.5ml per bottle

facility.name: Liucheng Center for Disease Control and Prevention
